A spokesman for the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Dmitry Pletenchuk, the forces of Ukraine's defense forces, in addition to the defeat of Russian large landing ships "Yamal" and "Azov", according to preliminary data, managed to hit the Russian reconnaissance ship "Ivan Hurs".

Dmitry Pletenchuk told about it duringlive etherThe only news of the "only news" in the morning of March 25, 2024.

"Information is now verified about the possible damage to another unit, the third one," said the AFU Navy spokesman

Dmitry Pletenchuk answered the clarifying question of the presenter whether the Ivan Hurs ship was talking about the ship.

He also confirmed the defeat of Ukraine's defense forces of Russian ships"Yamal"and Azov.

“One of these VDCs is already at the factory on repair. And given the damage, we can say that now of the 13 units that the Russians have prepared to capture our southern coast, only 3 units remain in the system, ”Dmitry Pletenchuk said.

"And about the ships of this project from the Black Sea Fleet, there are no units left," he added.

In addition, according to the spokesman of the Navy of the Armed Forces, the forces of defense managed to hit the building of the enemy naval base in Sevastopol and fuel and lubricants.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the defense forcesThey saidAbout the loss of leaders as a result of a blow to the Crimea.
title: The Navy of the Armed Forces told about the possible damage to the Russian ship Ivan Hurs
description: Dmytro Pletenchuk told about it during the live broadcast of the "One News" TV in the morning ...
